languages.text: {n}Кибелла поднимает голову и вглядывается в темные глазницы Неумирающего Императора.{/n} "Мы не отступимся от Завета. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}Не забудем жертв{/d} наших предшественников и наставлений Висирей. Жизнь наша — во служении Неумирающему. Ибо Он и есть долг. Ибо Он и есть смерть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла поднимает голову и вглядывается в темные глазницы Неумирающего Императора.{/n} "Мы не отступимся от стези Анн'шини. Не забудем жертв наших предшественников и наставлений Висирей. Жизнь наша — во служении Неумирающему. Ибо Он и есть долг. Ибо Он и есть смерть".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла поднимает голову и вглядывается в темные глазницы Неумирающего Императора.{/n} "Мы не отступимся от Завета. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}Не забудем жертв{/d} наших предшественников и наставлений Висирей. Жизнь наша — во служении Неумирающему. Ибо Он и есть долг. Ибо Он и есть смерть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head and peers into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the way of Ahn'shini. We will not forget our predecessors's sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty itself. For He is death itself."

{n}Kibellah raises her head and peers into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the way of Ahn'shini. We will not forget our predecessors's sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty itself. For He is death itself."

We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

{n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah redresse la tête pour fixer les orbites sombres de l'Empereur Immortel.{/n} « Nous resterons fidèles aux Préceptes. Nous {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}n'oublierons pas{/d} les sacrifices de nos prédécesseurs ni les enseignements des vizirs. Notre vie est au service de l'Immortel. Car Il est notre devoir. Il est la mort incarnée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah redresse la tête pour fixer les orbites sombres de l'Empereur Immortel.{/n} « Nous resterons fidèles aux Préceptes. Nous {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}n'oublierons pas{/d} les sacrifices de nos prédécesseurs ni les enseignements des vizirs. Notre vie est au service de l'Immortel. Car Il est notre devoir. Il est la mort incarnée. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah levanta la cabeza para mirar las cuencas de los ojos del Emperador Inmortal.{/n} «No nos desviaremos de la Doctrina. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}No nos olvidaremos{/d} de los sacrificios de nuestros predecesores y las enseñanzas de nuestros Visires. Nuestra vida es en servicio del Inmortal. Él es el deber. Él es la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah levanta la cabeza para mirar las cuencas de los ojos del Emperador Inmortal.{/n} «No nos desviaremos de la Doctrina. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}No nos olvidaremos{/d} de los sacrificios de nuestros predecesores y las enseñanzas de nuestros Visires. Nuestra vida es en servicio del Inmortal. Él es el deber. Él es la muerte».

languages.text: {n}キベラは頭を上げ、不死の皇帝の暗い眼窩を覗き込む。{/n}「信条から外れることはしません。先人の犠牲とヴィジールの教えを{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}忘れはしない{/d}。不死の者へ仕えることこそ我らの人生です。あの方に尽くすことこそが務め。あの方はこそが死であるからです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは頭を上げ、不死の皇帝の暗い眼窩を覗き込む。{/n}「信条から外れることはしません。先人の犠牲とヴィジールの教えを{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}忘れはしない{/d}。不死の者へ仕えることこそ我らの人生です。あの方に尽くすことこそが務め。あの方はこそが死であるからです」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈抬起头，凝视着不死神皇漆黑的眼窝。{/n}“我们绝不会偏离教义，{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}绝不会忘记{/d}众多先人的牺牲，也绝不会背离众位宿老的教诲。侍奉不死之神就是我们存在的意义，因为祂便是责任本身，祂便是死亡本身。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈抬起头，凝视着不死神皇漆黑的眼窝。{/n}“我们绝不会偏离教义，{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}绝不会忘记{/d}众多先人的牺牲，也绝不会背离众位宿老的教诲。侍奉不死之神就是我们存在的意义，因为祂便是责任本身，祂便是死亡本身。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hebt den Kopf, um in die dunklen Augenhöhlen des Todlosen Imperators zu blicken.{/n} "Wir werden nicht von den Geboten abweichen. Wir werden die Opfer unserer Vorgänger und die Lehren unserer Wesire {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}nicht vergessen{/d}. Der Dienst am Todlosen ist unser Leben. Denn Er ist die Pflicht. Er ist der Tod."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah hebt den Kopf, um in die dunklen Augenhöhlen des Todlosen Imperators zu blicken.{/n} "Wir werden nicht von den Geboten abweichen. Wir werden die Opfer unserer Vorgänger und die Lehren unserer Wesire {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}nicht vergessen{/d}. Der Dienst am Todlosen ist unser Leben. Denn Er ist die Pflicht. Er ist der Tod."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, Ölmeyen İmparator'un koyu renkli göz yuvalarına dikkatle bakmak için kafasını kaldırıyor.{/n} "İlkelerden sapmayacağız. Seleflerimizin fedakarlıklarını ve Vezirlerimizin öğretilerini {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}unutmayacağız{/d}. Ölmeyen'e hizmet, bizim yaşamımızdır. Çünkü o vazifemizdir, ölümün ta kendisidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises her head to peer into the Undying Emperor's dark eye sockets.{/n} "We will not stray from the Tenets. We {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}will not forget{/d} our predecessors' sacrifices and our Vizsiers' teachings. Service to the Undying One is our life. For He is duty. He is death."
